Inputs: ¤

  • input-boolean ¤

    A boolean input parameter

    Default: false
  • input-choice ¤

    A choice input parameter

    Default: option1
  • input-multiline ¤

    A multiline input parameter description that spans multiple lines for testing complex documentation scenarios

  • input-number ¤

    A numeric input parameter

    Default: 42
  • input-string - required ¤

    A string input parameter

    Default: default-value

Outputs: ¤

  • output-json ¤

    A JSON output containing complex data

  • output-number ¤

    A numeric output from the action

  • output-string ¤

    A string output from the action
